descriptions: Student does not demonstrate an understanding that area can be found by adding the areas of non-overlapping parts.
Student shows limited understanding, with significant errors in calculating areas or combining them.
Student demonstrates some understanding but struggles to accurately decompose figures or add the areas of the parts.  Errors are frequent.
Student generally understands that area is additive, but may make minor errors in decomposing figures or calculating total area.
Student consistently decomposes rectilinear figures into non-overlapping rectangles and accurately adds the areas to find the total area.

Student demonstrates a complete understanding of area as additive, accurately decomposing complex figures and finding the total area with clear and concise explanations. Can apply this to novel situations.
Student cannot decompose rectilinear figures into rectangles.
Student attempts to decompose figures but is unable to create appropriate rectangles or makes numerous errors.
Student can decompose some figures but struggles with more complex shapes or makes errors in determining the dimensions of the rectangles.
Student can decompose most rectilinear figures into rectangles, but may require some guidance or make minor errors.
Student accurately decomposes rectilinear figures into non-overlapping rectangles with no errors.
Student demonstrates mastery in decomposing complex rectilinear figures into rectangles efficiently and can explain the process clearly.
Student cannot apply the concept of area to solve real-world problems.
Student attempts to apply the concept, but the approach is flawed or results in an incorrect answer.
Student can apply the concept with significant guidance, but makes errors in setting up the problem or calculating the area.
Student can solve some real-world problems involving area, but may struggle with more complex scenarios or require some assistance.
Student can accurately solve real-world problems involving area, showing a clear understanding of the concept and its application.
Student can solve complex real-world problems involving area, and can explain and justify the solution strategy effectively.
